ComicInfo.Title: Chapter 11
ComicInfo.Summary: Chapter 11: Red Hood heads to Powers International to confront Bloom, and he discovers that Bloom has revived former Task Force Z members to fight for him. Two-Face leads the rest of the Task Force Z team to a back-door way into the facility, but they are discovered and attacked by Bloom.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-21 15:45:52. [CVDB943634] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 21:49:52. [Issue ID 2426146]
